reviews.review_msg: He is just amazing!!! The Best Professor I ever had at SFU :)

He is one of the best prof as many people already said it. He is great, helpful and funny. His lectures are interesting and make you want to be in class. His mid-term is easy but final maybe a little be harder (but not too hard). As long as u you do your jobs, you will be fine. An easy A+ for me
Super nice prof, great one on one if you need clarification. The final was hard but is doable if you have done the practice assignments.
